verses.verse: And he <S%G1831>went<s%> out from <S%G1564>there,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his own <S%G3968>country;<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> him.

And when the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue:<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> him were <S%G1605>astonished,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> From <S%G4159>where<s%> has <S%G5129>this<s%> man <S%G5023>these<s%> things? and <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is <S%G3588>this<s%> which is <S%G1325>given<s%> to him, that <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works are <S%G1096>worked<s%> by his <S%G5495>hands?<s%>

Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> the <S%G5045>carpenter,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> and of <S%G2455>Juda,<s%> and <S%G4613>Simon?<s%> and are not his <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> with us? And they were <S%G4624>offended<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> him.

But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, A <S%G4396>prophet<s%> is not <S%G820>without<s%> <S%G820>honor,<s%> but in his own <S%G3968>country,<s%> and <S%G1722>among<s%> his own <S%G4773>kin,<s%> and in his own house. <S%G3614><s%>

And he <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> <S%G1411>work,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> that he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G732>sick<s%> folk, and <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.
And he <S%G2296>marveled<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of their <S%G570>unbelief.<s%> And he <S%G4013>went<s%> <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2945>about<s%> the <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching.<s%>

And he <S%G4341>called<s%> to him the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G649>send<s%> them <S%G1614>forth<s%> by <S%G1417>two<s%> and <S%G1417>two;<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G1849>power<s%> over <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits;<s%>

And <S%G3853>commanded<s%> them that they should <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> for their <S%G3598>journey,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> a <S%G4464>staff<s%> <S%G3440>only;<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4082>money,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5475>money<s%> in their <S%G2223>purse:<s%>
But be <S%G5265>shod<s%> with <S%G4547>sandals;<s%> and not <S%G1746>put<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>coats.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, In <S%G3699>what<s%> <S%G3699>place<s%> <S%G1437>soever<s%> you <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> you <S%G1831>depart<s%> from that place. <S%G1564><s%>

And whoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall not <S%G1209>receive<s%> you, <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> you, when you <S%G1607>depart<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G1621>shake<s%> <S%G1621>off<s%> the <S%G5522>dust<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> against them. <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, It shall be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> and <S%G1116>Gomorrha<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for that city. <S%G4172><s%>
And they <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G2784>preached<s%> that men should <S%G3340>repent.<s%>
And they <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>devils,<s%> and <S%G218>anointed<s%> with <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G732>sick,<s%> and <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.

And <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of him; (for his <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G5318>spread<s%> <S%G1519>abroad:<s%> <S%G1096><s%>) and he <S%G3004>said,<s%> That <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G907>Baptist<s%> was <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works do <S%G1754>show<s%> <S%G1754>forth<s%> themselves in him.

<S%G243>Others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> That it is <S%G2243>Elias.<s%> And <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> That it is a <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> as <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>
But when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> thereof, he <S%G2036>said,<s%> It is <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G607>beheaded:<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

For <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> had <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> and laid <S%G2902>hold<s%> on <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> him in <S%G5438>prison<s%> for <S%G2266>Herodias'<s%> sake, his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip's<s%> <S%G1135>wife:<s%> for he had <S%G1060>married<s%> her.
For <S%G2491>John<s%> had <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for you to <S%G2192>have<s%> your <S%G80>brother's<s%> <S%G1135>wife.<s%>
Therefore <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> had a <S%G1758>quarrel<s%> against him, and <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G615>killed<s%> him; but she <S%G1410>could<s%> not:

For <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that he was a <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> and an <S%G40>holy,<s%> and <S%G4933>observed<s%> him; and when he <S%G191>heard<s%> him, he <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things, and <S%G191>heard<s%> him <S%G2234>gladly.<s%>

And when a <S%G2121>convenient<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> that <S%G2264>Herod<s%> on his <S%G1077>birthday<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G1173>supper<s%> to his <S%G3175>lords,<s%> <S%G5310>high<s%> <S%G5506>captains,<s%> and <S%G4413>chief<s%> estates of <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%>

And when the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of the <S%G846>said<s%> <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in, and <S%G3738>danced,<s%> and <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> and them that <S%G4873>sat<s%> with him, the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G2877>damsel,<s%> <S%G154>Ask<s%> of me <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G2309>will,<s%> and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> it you.
And he <S%G3660>swore<s%> to her, <S%G3739>Whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you shall <S%G154>ask<s%> of me, I will <S%G1325>give<s%> it you, to the <S%G2255>half<s%> of my <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>

And she <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to her <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall I <S%G154>ask?<s%> And she <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist.<s%>

And she <S%G1525>came<s%> in <S%G2112>straightway<s%> with <S%G4710>haste<s%> to the <S%G935>king,<s%> and <S%G154>asked,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> that you <S%G1325>give<s%> me by and by in a <S%G4094>charger<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist.<s%>

And the <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G4036>exceeding<s%> <S%G4036>sorry;<s%> yet for his <S%G3727>oath's<s%> sake, and for their sakes <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4873>sat<s%> with him, he <S%G2309>would<s%> not <S%G114>reject<s%> her.

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> an <S%G4688>executioner,<s%> and <S%G2004>commanded<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> to be <S%G5342>brought:<s%> and he <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G607>beheaded<s%> him in the <S%G5438>prison,<s%>

And <S%G5342>brought<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> in a <S%G4094>charger,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to the <S%G2877>damsel:<s%> and the <S%G2877>damsel<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to her <S%G3384>mother.<s%>
And when his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, they <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> up his <S%G4430>corpse,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> it in a <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>

And the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> themselves <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> him <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> they had <S%G4160>done,<s%> and <S%G3745>what<s%> they had <S%G2258>taught.<s%> <S%G1321><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1205>Come<s%> you yourselves <S%G5210><s%> <S%G846><s%> apart <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> and <S%G373>rest<s%> a while: <S%G3641><s%> for there were <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> and <S%G5217>going,<s%> and they had <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G2119>leisure<s%> <S%G3761>so<s%> much as to <S%G5315>eat.<s%>
And they <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> by <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2596>privately.<s%> <S%G2398><s%>

And the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> them <S%G5217>departing,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1921>knew<s%> him, and <S%G4936>ran<s%> <S%G3979>afoot<s%> <S%G1563>thither<s%> out of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4172>cities,<s%> and <S%G4281>preceded<s%> them, and <S%G4905>came<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> to him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when he <S%G1831>came<s%> out, <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> and was <S%G4697>moved<s%> with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they were as <S%G4263>sheep<s%> not <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G4166>shepherd:<s%> and he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> them <S%G4183>many<s%> things.

And when the <S%G5610>day<s%> was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4183>far<s%> spent, his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> and <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G5610>time<s%> is <S%G4183>far<s%> passed:

<S%G630>Send<s%> them <S%G630>away,<s%> that they may <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G68>country<s%> <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2945>about,<s%> and <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>villages,<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G740>bread:<s%> for they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> to <S%G5315>eat.<s%>

He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1325>Give<s%> you them to eat. <S%G5315><s%> And they <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, Shall we <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>pennyworth<s%> of <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> them to <S%G5315>eat?<s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you? <S%G5217>go<s%> and see. <S%G1492><s%> And when they <S%G1097>knew,<s%> they <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G4002>Five,<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>
And he <S%G2004>commanded<s%> them to <S%G347>make<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G347>sit<s%> <S%G347>down<s%> by <S%G4849>companies<s%> on the <S%G5515>green<s%> <S%G5528>grass.<s%>
And they <S%G377>sat<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> in <S%G4237>ranks,<s%> by <S%G1540>hundreds,<s%> and by <S%G4004>fifties.<s%>

And when he had <S%G2983>taken<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> he <S%G308>looked<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed,<s%> and <S%G2622>broke<s%> the <S%G740>loaves,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> them to his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> them; and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes<s%> <S%G3307>divided<s%> he among them <S%G3956>all.<s%>
And they did <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>eat,<s%> and were <S%G5526>filled.<s%>
And they <S%G142>took<s%> up <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G2801>fragments,<s%> and of the <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>
And they that did <S%G5315>eat<s%> of the <S%G740>loaves<s%> were <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> he <S%G315>constrained<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G1684>get<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and to <S%G4254>go<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> to <S%G966>Bethsaida,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> he <S%G630>sent<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> the <S%G3793>people.<s%>
And when he had <S%G657>sent<s%> them <S%G657>away,<s%> he <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> to <S%G4336>pray.<s%>
And when <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> was in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and he <S%G3441>alone<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1095>land.<s%>

And he <S%G1492>saw<s%> them <S%G928>toiling<s%> in <S%G1643>rowing;<s%> for the <S%G417>wind<s%> was <S%G1727>contrary<s%> to them: and <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> to them, <S%G4043>walking<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G3928>passed<s%> by them.
But when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> him <S%G4043>walking<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they <S%G1380>supposed<s%> it had <S%G1511>been<s%> a <S%G5326>spirit,<s%> and <S%G349>cried<s%> out:

For they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, and were <S%G5015>troubled.<s%> And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> he <S%G2980>talked<s%> with them, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Be of good <S%G2293>cheer:<s%> it is I; be not afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

And he <S%G305>went<s%> up to them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>ship;<s%> and the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>ceased:<s%> and they were <S%G3029>sore<s%> <S%G1839>amazed<s%> in <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1537>beyond<s%> <S%G4053><s%> <S%G4053>measure,<s%> and <S%G2296>wondered.<s%>
For they <S%G4920>considered<s%> not the miracle of the <S%G740>loaves:<s%> for their <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4456>hardened.<s%>
And when they had <S%G1276>passed<s%> <S%G1276>over,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G1095>land<s%> of <S%G1082>Gennesaret,<s%> and <S%G4358>drew<s%> to the <S%G4358>shore.<s%>
